title: Lal Isu ka puma fai zawh ka duh e
lyrics:
Lal Isu, ka puma fai zawh ka duh e, 
Ka thinlung chhunga awmah ka duh a che; 
Milem zawng zawng leh hmelma zawng tichhuak la, 
Tunah mi sil la, vur aiin ka var ang.

Vur ai pawhin ka var zawk ngei ang, 
Min sil la, vur aiin ka var ang; 
Tunah min sil la, vur aiin ka var ang.

Lal Isu, bawlhhlawh eng mah awm phal suh la, 
I thisenin kaidum zawng zawng silfai rawh; 
Sil faina chu engkim aiin ka ngaihlu, /
Tunah min sil la, vur aiin ka var ang.

Lalpa, van thutthleng atangin min en la, 
Tun hnuah intheihnghilh turin min pui la; 
I hma lo chu ka hma ka sial tawh loh nan, 
Tunah min sil la, vur aiin ka var ang.

Lalpa, tihtakzetin hei hi ka dil che, 
I kraws tuarna bualah tunah ka nghak che, 
Rinnain ka hmu, i thisen hlu luang chu, 
Tunah min sil la, vur aiin ka var ang.

Lal Isu, rei tak ka nghah che hi i hria, 
Ka chhunga awmin rilru thar min siam la, 
Nangmah zawngtute Nangin i hnar ngai lo, 
Tunah min sil la, vur aiin ka var ang.
